sentence.Network_en: He is legendary for his fearlessness and pugnacity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是出了名的大胆好斗。

sentence.Network_en: His legendary tardiness left audiences waiting for hours.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的迟到是出了名的，让观众干等了好几个小时。

sentence.Network_en: His thoroughness and attention to detail is legendary.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的严谨和对细节的关注是出了名的。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 传奇(Legendary) --- 橘色/红色，极罕见，似乎物品上会有编号，像是这是总共五件魔杖中的第三件这样套装物品无特定颜色，蓝的橘 …
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... legend n 传奇；图例 legendary a 传奇的，像传奇一样的 legal a 法律的.
高三英语单词列表_百度知道 ... come  to  an  end 结束;终止 legendary  adj. 传奇的;传说的 tax  n. 税;税额.
the legendary patron saint of children ., 传说中的孩子的守护神.

list.abs: Marcel Marceau has died . the legendary mime entertained audiences for more than 50 years and never said a word . he once said Charlie Chaplin was his greatest inspiration . Marcel was 84 .马赛尔.马尔索逝世！这位传奇的滑稽剧和哑剧演员在50多年来给广大观众带来了无穷的欢乐.他曾说过查理.卓别林给予他最大的鼓舞.马赛尔终
Legend tells of a legendary warrior whose kungfu skills were the stuff of legend ., 传奇故事传颂一位传奇大侠 , 他的功夫无人能敌的传奇.
孢子游戏徽章_攻略秘籍_大米单机游戏网 ... the great 伟大之士 the legendary 传奇之士 the all-powerful 强权之士.
He told us a story about a legendary hero ., 他给我们讲了一个传奇英雄的故事.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent. (as a noun denoting a collection of legends, especially of saints' lives): from medieval Latin legendarius, from legenda 'things to be read' (see legend)

entry.def: If you describe someone or something as legendary, you mean that they are very famous and that many stories are told about them.

example.tran: 大名鼎鼎的爵士乐歌手阿德莱德·霍尔
他的政治手腕高超是出了名的。

entry.tran: 传说中的；古老传奇中的
entry.def: A legendary person, place, or event is mentioned or described in an old legend.

example.ex: The hill is supposed to be the resting place of the legendary King Lud.
example.tran: 这座山据称是传说中的卢德王的长眠之处。

means.word_mean: 1. so celebrated as to having taken on the nature of a legend;

sentences.sentence: "the legendary exploits of the arctic trailblazers"
"the fabled Paul Bunyan and his blue ox"

auth_sentence.content: I was in the legendary city of New York.
auth_sentence.res_content: I was in the legendary city of New York.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I was in the legendary city of New York.

auth_sentence.content: Despite the controversy, Maradona's skill is legendary.
auth_sentence.res_content: Despite the controversy, Maradona's skill is legendary.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Despite the controversy, Maradona's skill is legendary.

auth_sentence.content: It was a fitting venue for the legendary musician.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a fitting venue for the legendary musician.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a fitting venue for the legendary musician.

stems_affixes.word_buile: il不+legitimate合法的→adj.不合法的,私生的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的
stems_affixes.word_buile: leg法律+al……的→adj.法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 合法的, 合理的, 正统的
stems_affixes.word_buile: leg法律+itm+ate表形容词→adj.合法的, 合理的, 正统的
il不+legible可读的→adj.难读的,难认的
legend[n.传说,传奇;图例]+ary……的→adj.传说的,传奇的
de加强+leg法律+ate人,也可表示动词→加强法律之人→代表

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不法, 私生, 反常, 不合逻辑
stems_affixes.word_buile: illegitimate[adj.不合法的,私生的]+cy表名词→n.不法, 私生, 反常, 不合逻辑

stems_affixes.value_cn: 合法,墨守陈规,法律上的义务
stems_affixes.word_buile: legal[adj.法律的,法定的;合法的,正当的]+ity表名词→n.合法,墨守陈规,法律上的义务

stems_affixes.value_cn: 学院,高等专科学校,大学
stems_affixes.word_buile: col共同+leg讲,读,说+e→共同说,共同读的地方→大学
leg讲,读,说+end→讲出的东西→传奇的故事;引申为地图的图例

stems_affixes.value_cn: 功课,课;一堂课,一节课;[常复]课程;教训
stems_affixes.word_buile: less=leg讲,读,说+on表名词→讲话,教训→课
de加强+leg法律+ate人,也可表示动词→加强法律之人→代表
re反+leg法律+ate表动词→反法律的人被放逐

Sentence.sentence: He has long been a legendary figure.
Good evening and welcome to tonight's edition of Legendary Lives.

sentences.en: Legendary stories are passed down from parents to children.
sentences.cn: 传奇故事是由父母传给孩子们的。

means.word_mean: 著名的, 名扬四海的

sentences.en: Great Olympic athletes have become legendary.
sentences.cn: 杰出的奥林匹克运动员都已名扬四海。
